7 * 21
a: 00000111
b: 00010101
x: 000000000010101
p: 000000000000000
append 0 to a
a: 000001110
First operation 110: p = p + -x
   000000000000000
 + 111111111101011
p: 111111111101011
x: 000000001010100
Second operation 011: p = p + 2x
   111111111101011
 + 000000010101000
p: 000000010010011
x: 000000101010000
Third operation 000: p = p + 0
   000000010010011
 + 000000000000000
p: 000000010010011
x: 000010101000000
Forth operation 000: p = p + 0
   000000010010011
 + 000000000000000
p: 000000010010011
x: 001010100000000
Output: 000000010010011 = 147

a: 00000111
b: 11100001
x: 111111111100001
p: 000000000000000
append 0 to a
a: 000001110
First operation 110: p = p + -x
   000000000000000
 + 000000000011111
p: 000000000011111
x: 111111110000100
Second operation 011: p = p + 2x
   000000000011111

p: 111111100100111
x: 111111000010000
Third operation 000: p = p + 0
   111111100100111
 + 000000000000000
p: 111111100100111
x: 111100001000000
Forth operation 000: p = p + 0
   111111100100111
 + 000000000000000
p: 111111100100111
x: 110000100000000
Output: 111111100100111 = -217

a: 11100001
b: 11100001
x: 111111111100001

append 0 to a
a: 111000010
First operation 010: p = p + x
   000000000000000
 + 111111111100001
p: 111111111100001
x: 111111110000100

   111111111100001
 + 000000000000000

x: 111111000010000

   111111111100001

p: 000001111000001
x: 111100001000000

   000001111000001
 + 000000000000000

-31 * 21
a: 11100001
b: 00010101
x: 000000000010101
p: 000000000000000
append 0 to a
a: 111000010
First operation 010: p = p + x
   000000000000000
 + 000000000010101
p: 000000000010101
x: 000000001010100
Second operation 000: p = p + 0
   000000000010101
 + 000000000000000
p: 000000000010101
x: 000000101010000
Third operation 100: p = p + -2x
   000000000010101
 + 111110101100000
p: 111110101110101
x: 000010101000000
Forth operation 111: p = p + 0
   111110101110101
 + 000000000000000
p: 111110101110101
x: 0010101000000
Output: 111110101110101 = -651
